description: Erection of replacement infill extension to the rear with walk-on rooflight, replacement of windows and doors with double glazed sash windows and doors (including dormer windows), new fan light above the entrance door, replacement hopper on the front elevation, enlargement of window for new door and bricking up of existing window in the lower ground floor rear elevation and installation of 8 air condensers, 2 air handling units an 2 extract fans and associated landscaping and removal of white paint from brickwork on the rear façade, repair and repointing of brickwork on front and rear elevations, re-rendering of lower ground floor front façade, replacement of clay chimney pots, partial dismantling and rebuilding of section of rear parapet and associated internal works including new internal stair.
